channel.title: I Need A Hoster
channel.description:
Ok, i need a hoster for my newly Completed server: xKwonDo PKz (my parents wont let me portforward so any noobs says 'port forward nub' will be reported) if you do get to host you will be given admin rights, if you wish to host please fill out this form:
Can I Be Trusted: Can I Host No-Ip: How Long Can I Host A Week: How Good Is My Connection:
with the connection bit say if its good, if you arent sure go to this website: [url=http://speedtest.net/]http://speedtest.net/[/url] and post a screenshot after its finished :) ~Carney ^_^

item.title: I Need A Hoster
item.dc:creator: @carney carney
item.description:
@carney wrote:

Ok, i need a hoster for my newly Completed server: xKwonDo PKz
(my parents wont let me portforward so any noobs says ‘port forward nub’ will be reported)
if you do get to host you will be given admin rights, if you wish to host please fill out this form:
